person.persName: Richard Oldham (Madison County, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Madison County native. Married to Minerva N. Ross Oldham on November 9, 1865. Resident in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Madison County in 1860. Household owned nine enslaved persons in Madison County in 1860. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as private from September 10, 1862 to July 19, 1863.
